DOC.brief_summary: There body evidence evaluate effect Weight Watchers , commercially available weight loss program , change body weight . The current investigation aim add body evidence provide additional data change body weight enhance current evidence-base regard evaluate health-related outcome . There little evidence demonstrate whether weight loss result Weight Watchers program elicits change health-related functional outcome aerobic capacity , flexibility , sleep , psychological measure . Additionally , within scientific research protocol , measure adherence satisfaction also evaluate evaluate . This study evaluate outcome beyond weight change achieve across 24-week program .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Commercial Program Weight Loss Health Outcomes 2
DOC.criteria: Male female age 1875 year . Set `` soft quota '' number male female participant . The desire 80 % female/20 % male split . Willing enroll Weight Watchers Program With without previous Weight Watchers experience Set maximum quota number participant previous Weight Watchers experience 65 % . Selfreported height/weight result Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 25 43 ( rescreen facility ) . Self report he/she feel need lose weight . Willing discontinue current overthecounter ( OTC ) supplement recommended/prescribed physician , exception multivitamin vitamin supplement . Willing follow recommendation require study protocol . Willing include demographic information ( e.g. , ethnicity , income education ) . Use personal iPhone daily basis 1. iPhone must iOS 8.0 later 2 . Must least 600 MB available storage accommodate size app The willingness ability navigate use application iPhone daily basis ( minimum training provide ) Reliable home WiFi access Ability commit attend 27 study visit approximately 26 week : 1 . Ability commit ( best ability ) attend weekly meeting , 3060 minute duration , day time week 24 consecutive week . 2 . Ability commit 3 additional study visit Weeks 0 , 12 24 , visit 6090 minute duration complete assessment ( height , weight , questionnaire , physical measure ) . Currently , within last 6 month , try lose weight follow guideline ( e.g. , selfinitiated program 52 , Atkins ) structure weightloss program ( e.g. , medical center , university , commercial program ) A member Weight Watchers within past 12 month . Involved related research study selfreport agree enroll study may affect weight health outcome next 12 month . Pregnant nursing , plan become pregnant next 9 month . Reported health problem make weight loss unsupervised exercise unsafe unreasonable ( e.g. , orthopedic limitation , heart problem ) Untreated thyroid disease change ( type dose ) thyroid medication last 6 month . Taking prescription medication know effect appetite weight ( e.g. , oral steroid , weight loss medication Qysmia , Contrave , etc . ) exception subject stable dose Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors ( SSRIs ) 6 month Diuretic use hypertension 1.5mg per day Chronic/inflammatory gastrointestinal disorder ( irritable bowel syndrome acceptable ) . History heart problem ( e.g. , angina , bypass surgery , myocardial infarction , etc . ) within previous 6 month . Resting systolic blood pressure > 160 mmHg rest diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg Diagnosis type 1 type 2 diabetes . Previous surgical procedure weight loss . Major surgery within previous 6 month . Presence implant cardiac defibrillator pacemaker . History cancer within past 5 year current treatment cancer ( completely resect basal squamous cell carcinoma acceptable treatment complete 6 month prior enrollment ) .
